summary: An ordinance submitting to the qualified voters of the City of Seattle, at the general election to be held in such city on Tuesday, the 4th day of March, 1919, the question of incurring an indebtedness in the sum of Five Hundred Thousand Dollars ($500,000) by the issuance and sale of general bonds of the city to provide money for the purpose of acquiring, constructing and equipping a general municipal hospital.
